footer-disclaimer: This is an alpha version. This website is unfinished and subject to major changes. Join our discord for updates and discuss your ideas for the site.
agree-to-tos-pre: I understand and agree to the
automatically-logged-out: If successful, you will be automatically logged out. Please log in with your new password.
name: Name
title: Title
already-have-guest-account-register-warn: Note: You already have a guest account. You can turn your guest account into a regular account to gain access to the social aspect of the app, without losing progress, by going to your settings. By registering a new account here you will still be able to access to your guest account, but you will start over on your newly registered account.
password-reset-failed: Password reset failed. Either revisit the link through your e-mail or try again later.
delete-notification-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this notification?
block-user-confirmation: Are you sure you wish to block {user}?
no-blocked-users: You have no users on your blocklist.
not-yet-done: Hold up, you're not quite done yet.
feedback-explanation: Do you have any feedback for us? Features you'd like to suggest, new ideas for content, opinions on the site overall? Please fill in this form and we'll contact you if we have any questions or remarks.
feedback-features: Do you have ideas for a new feature? Try to describe your idea as detailed as possible. What do you want it to do? Where would you like to see it? We can further discuss these ideas on our Discord.
feedback-accessibility: Do you have feedback regarding accessibility? Please describe the problem you are facing and what would help you in this matter. If you use any programs that provides accessibility but encounter problems on this website, please leave the name of the program as well.
send-diagnostics-information: Send diagnostics information (window size, operating system and browser version)
send-diagnostics-information-explanation: Sending this information can help us fix problems which may not occur on our own machine and helps us debugging much quicker.
question: Question
changes-will-not-be-saved: Changes made to this example will not be saved. Create an account to manage your own task list.
explanation-tasks: Create repeatable or one-off tasks to manage your to-do list. Create sub-tasks to divide your chore up in bite-sized chunks and keep a clear overview of your mission. You can use this to create order in your daily chores, discipline yourself into new habits or work towards a bigger goal.
explanation-reward: Choose between improving a character or growing a village and watch it grow with each task you complete. Want to reach a higher level with your character or reach a new level with your village? Be sure to finish your chores for the day and watch your reward grow. Can't decide between a character or a village? You can switch whenever you feel like it, without losing progress! Of course, if this doesn't interest you, there's an option to turn it off entirely and switch it on at your disposal.
explanation-reward-header: Grow your character or village by completing tasks
explanation-social: While you can use this app alone, it's much more fun with friends. Invite your friends and make your own group, where you can see each other's progress and motivate each other.
if-mistake-submit-report: If you believe this is an error, please submit a
example-task-completed: That's how you complete tasks! Log in to manage your own tasks.
example-task-created: That's how you make tasks! Note that these tasks won't be saved. Log in to create your own lists.
